title: The Stowaway
description: What should have been another straightforward mission has become Commander Michelle Burkhardt’s greatest challenge.With an unblemished mission record and history of personal sacrifice, Commander Burkhardt has the respect of her superiors, the loyalty of her crew, and now the mission that will seal her place in Pioneer One - Establish a base camp on Mars.It’s the crucial, complex mission Burkhardt was born to lead. All systems are nominal until she discovers the a confused old man inside her ship’s airlock.This charming old stranger soon ingratiates himself with the crew, a pleasant distraction from their duties.But as his influence grows and critical systems begin to fail; Burkhardt suspects the stowaway may be more than he claims…Facing her toughest challenge, can Commander Michelle Burkhardt uncover the truth in time to save the mission, her crew, and maybe even her life?
author: Elwood  Scott
